duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate as a QA member in an agile team, reviewing and clarifying requirements, creating and executing test plans/scripts/scenarios, and logging defects.
Facilitate testing meetings, summarize results, issue/defect reporting, and maintain metrics.
Generate and manage test data for short and long term application needs, and validate APIs for functionality and reliability.
Develop and execute test cases for API testing, collaborating with the development team to understand API functionalities.
Support team in Production deployment planning and validations, managing deployments into Test and UAT environments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
